title: Home Page
description: Pacific Gas and Electric Company provides natural gas and electric service to approximately 16 million people throughout a 70,000-square mile service area in northern and central California.
cleaned_text: Summer is here and using your AC to cool down can increase how much energy you use. Take advantage of easy tips to help reduce your energy use. As your energy use changes from season to season, keep payments predictable with our free and easy Budget Billing. The Power Saver Rewards Program can help you earn a bill credit for temporarily reducing your energy use when demand is high. PG&E's Corporate Sustainability Report brings our partnerships and our commitment to sustainability to life. Learn how we're building a better PG&E.
